snippet: Shirley L. Huntley, who had pleaded guilty to stealing from a nonprofit organization she ran, recorded conversations at her home in hopes of receiving leniency.
abstract: Former New York State Sen Shirley L Huntley of Queens is sentenced to one year in prison after pleading guilty to stealing from nonprofit organization she ran.

byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and William K. Rashbaum contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Shirley L. Huntley, who had pleaded guilty to stealing from a nonprofit organization she ran, recorded conversations at her home in hopes of receiving leniency.

headline.seo: Huntley Is Sentenced to a Year in Prison
headline.main: One-Year Prison Sentence for an Ex-State Senator Who Taped Her Colleagues
headline.print_headline: One-Year Prison Sentence For an Ex-State Senator Who Taped Her Colleagues
